data.message: Bye bye Facebook I won't support Gay Pride, never have and never will. God DID NOT MAKE PEOPLE GAY It's a sin against Gods word. SHAME ON YOU!!!!

replies.message: God's FAKE so shame on thou too.

I'm glad there's some people who're against this gay thing it's not just a sin it's a disease they have no idea ,many centuries agoo homosexuals were on earth but god destroyed them all of them with a terrible tornado.Guess what why tornados r a lot in america????well it's a dangerous area if i were u gays I will stop it immidiately but you don't care so plz keep that thing at your home don't spread it!!!!
^Epic facepalm. You honestly believe that the sole cause of tornadoes are homosexual people? The stupidity, it burns!!!
So, why is your account still active?

I don't recommend leaving FB with these folks. Jesus wouldn't.  His unconditional love is extended to them as it is us. All have sinned and fallen short of the glory. If we are gonna be gay though. We might as well all start picking our nose and sharing boogers.
